subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: For all those who still care about the America’s Cup after the shortsighted shenanigans of the past nine months, fans still do not know when and where sailing’s main event will take place.
snippet: For all those who still care about the America’s Cup after the shortsighted shenanigans of the past nine months, fans still do not know when and where sailing’s main event will take place.
